actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for judicial review of administrative decisions by the Administrator of the Veterans Administration; to make the due process requirements of the Administrative Procedure Act applicable to the rules, regulations, and orders of the Veterans' Administration; and for other purposes.
short_title: Veterans Administrative Fairness and Judicial Review Act

summary.text: Veterans Administrative Fairness and Judicial Review Act - Provides for judicial review of administrative decisions made by the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs, and makes all Veterans Administration rules and determinations subject to the Administrative Procedure Act and related provisions.

titles.title: Veterans Administrative Fairness and Judicial Review Act

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for judicial review of administrative decisions by the Administrator of the Veterans Administration; to make the due process requirements of the Administrative Procedure Act applicable to the rules, regulations, and orders of the Veterans' Administration; and for other purposes.
